price: (32) [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allāh] and keeper [of His covenant].
arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: hādhā mā tūʿadūna likulli awwābin ḥafīẓin
